room_title: Escape room "Antidote" by Escapology Las Vegas in Las Vegas
review: Was our first time doing an escape room and it was great. Not sure I would have got out if not for my trusty sidekicks. Did Antidote and would do another one for sure. Place and staff were nice.

room_title: Escape room "Antidote" by Escapology Las Vegas in Las Vegas
review: My wife booked "Antidote" for our family. This was the first escape room for all but my daughter in college. The place was clean, the staff was friendly and helpful. The 4 of us made it through with 8 minutes left. A little squabbling, but most families with Mom, dad and two teenage girls will have that!We will be back to try another room in the future.

room_title: Escape room "Antidote" by Escapology Las Vegas in Las Vegas
review: Completed the Antidote room. It was well thought out and flowed very well. Lots of creativity in the room. Had an amazing time!

room_title: Escape room "Antidote" by Escapology Las Vegas in Las Vegas
review: Played all of six rooms in Escapology. They really put a lot of thought in detail, starting from the guest area and ending with the rooms. Antidote was probably my favorite since it was very technological and challenging. The Code is a solid contender. Hope they open new rooms soon!

room_title: Escape room "Antidote" by Escapology Las Vegas in Las Vegas
review: Took my boys for a family outing, it was a blast! Everyone was involved and got a chance to shine. Will be back later for sure!!
